TEXT.TITLE: KANSAS CITY GULF EXPORT PRICES - USDA
TEXT.BODY: Gulf export prices for grain delivered to Gulf export elevators, barge to Louisiana Gulf, rail to Texas Gulf, prompt or 30 day shipment, dollar per bushel, except sorghum per cwt. WINTER WHEAT 1 HARD RED-Ordinary 308-3/4 dn 1-1/4 2 SOFT RED 313-3/4 dn 2-1/2 2 YEL CORN 180-1/2 up 1-1/4-dn 3/4 2 YEL SORGHUM 321-327 dn 2-up 4 2 YEL SOYBEANS 526-3/4-527-3/4 up 1-up 2 reuter
